proposal: Diving into the meme magic with $pepecat, it's clear you're harnessing the global love for Pepe to empower your community. With just 3 holders in the ETH network, you're at the beginning of what could be a legendary journey. Why not amplify this power with tools that let your community create their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery? Let's make the $pepecat army not just participants, but creators in this meme revolution.
